title: User Review Response
description: A response from an app owner or representative to a UserReview attestation. Uses refUID to reference the original review.

@context.description: Optional JSON-LD context URI for semantic processing.

attester.title: Attester ID
attester.description: DID of the entity or representative responding to the review.

subject.title: Reviewer ID
subject.description: DID of the original reviewer being responded to.

refUID.title: User Review UID
refUID.description: The UID of the user review being responded to.

responseBody.title: Response
responseBody.description: Free-form text containing the response to the review.

issuedAt.title: Issued Date
issuedAt.description: Unix timestamp (in seconds) when the response was issued. Default is the current time.
